article_title: Washington's Plan To End Private Practice Medicine

article_metadata.author: Scott Gottlieb

og.description: In fixing the busted system that Medicare uses to pay American doctors, Congress has settled on a scheme that visits so many complexities on physicians, that it will inevitably stoke the continued demise of private, independent medical practices. Many in Washington favor this outcome. Regulators at the Centers for Medicare and Medicaid [...]
